title: Didn't get the new blue essence.
body: When I logged in the live servers I got the preseason popup.  I clicked ok and went to my missions, the only one there was the first win of the day xp mission. That was a few hours ago and the blue essence mission still isn't there. How do I get that mission?

replies.body: The popup was an intro to the conversion and your grand total BE, including those after the mission.  Some players did not receive the mission though, if they had no eligible content for rune conversion.  The deadline for the rune refunds was September 1st, but looking into your specific account it looks like that content was purchased after.  Sorry for the confusion!

> [{quoted}](name=ººp,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=M9zisioZ,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-11-08T23:12:27.059+0000)
